# deleteBackward()

**Instance Method**

Deletes a character from the displayed text.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func deleteBackward()
```

## Discussion

Remove the character just before the cursor from your class’s backing store and redisplay the text.

## Inserting and deleting text

- **insertText(_:)**: Inserts a character into the displayed text.
- **hasText**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the text-entry object has any text.
